posts.title: Light Up Totoro Plushie
posts.content: Ward off any night time monsters with the soft and cuddly light up Totoro Plushie. This snuggly plushie is inspired from the My Neighbor Tototo Japanese film and makes an ideal gift for anime fans as well as young children afraid of the dark.

posts.title: Kid Robot Rick And Morty Figure
posts.content: Show your favorite interdimensional trouble makers some love by decorating your bedroom with this Kid Robot Rick and Morty figure. This officially licensed work of art stands at nine inches and depicts the dynamic duo using a portal to escape the Galactic Federation.

posts.title: BagoBago Backpack Chair
posts.content: Make the traveling process a little less taxing on your body by packing your things inside the BagoBago backpack chair. It features ample storage space along with a sturdy built-in stool that you can easily pull out any time you need a place to sit.

posts.title: Millennium Falcon Waffle Maker
posts.content: Send your taste buds to a galaxy far, far away with these Millennium Falcon waffles. This officially licensed waffle maker whips up Millennium Falcon shaped waffles that accurately depict the fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy – right down to the side cockpit.

posts.title: Alien Egg Ceramic Cookie Jar
posts.content: Make it look as if your hand is being devoured by a Xenomorph when you grab a cookie out of this Alien egg ceramic cookie jar. It’s expertly styled to look exactly like a Xenomorph egg – complete with a cool facehugger lid.

posts.title: Dishwasher Clean/Dirty Flip Sign
posts.content: The magnetic dishwasher clean/dirt flip sign is the clever way to inform the other inhabitants of your home whether the dishes require cleaning or not. Much like in restaurants and diners, the sign politely informs you if the dishwasher is full or open for business.

posts.title: Motorized Electric Stand Up Paddleboard
posts.content: The inflatable motorized Stingray water board delivers all the fun of a stand up paddle board without the tiresome paddling part. It’s powered by a compact 12 volt battery, has a 200 pound capacity, and features a 6 inch thick bottom PVC layer for added durability.

posts.title: F*ck Off Sleeping Mask
posts.content: Ensure you remain undisturbed while you’re catching some Z’s by wearing this “Fuck Off” sleeping mask. It’s made from ultra smooth and soft 100% silk on both sides, filled with fluffy cotton, and embroidered with a bold message that’ll keep others away.

posts.title: 3-In-1 Emergency Car Tool
posts.content: If you own a vehicle and value your life, there’s no excuse for not owning this 3-in-1 emergency car tool. This indispensable tool offers a seat belt cutter, a tungsten window breaking tip, and a handy flashlight so that you can illuminate the dark.

posts.title: Healthy Bacon Flavored Seaweed
posts.content: Good news everyone – scientists have discovered a seaweed that tastes like bacon while offering twice the nutritional value of kale! This miracle seaweed is a fast-growing strain of red marine algae known as dulse, that tastes just like bacon when fried.

posts.title: Kasa Smart Wi-Fi Power Strip
posts.content: Control your electronics from virtually anywhere by plugging them into the Kasa smart Wi-Fi power strip. It comes with six independently controlled smart outlets and three built-in USB ports so that you can control and monitor the electrical output of each device.

posts.title: Squatty Potty Bathroom Toilet Stool
posts.content: Improve your overall colon health by placing the Squatty Potty bathroom toilet stool right by your porcelain throne. It’s designed to fit any standard toilet and places your body in a more natural squatting position for a quicker and healthier elimination.
